derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French magicien, from late Latin magica (see magic)

entry.def: A magician is a person who entertains people by doing magic tricks.
In fairy stories, a magician is a person, usually a man, who has magic powers.
If you call someone a magician, you admire the skilful and exciting way they do something.

example.ex: Bevan was a magician with words.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who performs magic tricks to amuse an audience
2. one who practices magic or sorcery
